title: Anchor Prompts
introText: Create list of affirmations or intentions to pair with Half-Smile: 'I am grounded,' 'This is temporary,' 'I can navigate this.' Use these when practicing the skill.

reflection.title: Reflection
reflection.question: How will you use these prompts with your Half-Smile practice?
reflection.placeholder: e.g., I'll say 'I am grounded' silently while adopting Half-Smile when I feel anxious....
